system.description: Effect: A slowing web are scattered in the [Blast] area. A creature that attacks through the web loses -1 SPD stage for 5 activations for every meter then travel. A creature that starts activation in the web are Slowed 1.

actions.name: Sticky Web
actions.description: Effect: A slowing web are scattered in the [Blast] area. A creature that attacks through the web loses -1 SPD stage for 5 activations for every meter then travel. A creature that starts activation in the web are Slowed 1.
